member.name: T:com.tikumo.regdiff.Presence
member.summary: This enum specifies if a parameter is optional (=can be omitted) or required (=must be present)

member.name: T:com.tikumo.regdiff.regdiff
member.summary: This program is a small command line tool to compare two registry files, export the registry, merge .REG files and much more. Refer to http://p-nand-q.com/download/regdiff.html for a detailed manual. Refer to http://code.google.com/p/regdiff/ for the complete sourcecode. Copyright (C) 2013 by Gerson Kurz BSD-Licensed
member.todo: support remove-keys/values when reading .REG File format
throw syntax error if $$ option cannot be found
LATER: hex dump format to mimic regedit format
